base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with a simple design.
part_description: The cabinet has three sections, each with two doors. Each door has a vertical handle. The sections are stacked vertically, creating a tall, narrow structure.
internal_interaction_description: The doors of each section open to reveal internal storage space. Each section is likely to have shelves for organizing items. The vertical handles allow easy opening and closing of the doors, facilitating access to stored contents.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall in a room, providing storage for various items. Users interact with it by opening the doors via the handles. Its neutral color and simple design allow it to blend with different interior styles.
